articles.title: „Politische Streitereien werden beiseitegelegt und Nothilfe wird geleistet“
articles.image_title: MALATYA, TURKIYE - FEBRUARY 08: An aerial view of the collapsed buildings while search and rescue efforts continue in Malatya after 7.7 and 7.6 magnitude earthquakes hit multiple provinces of Turkiye including Malatya, Turkiye on February 07, 2023. Early Monday morning, a strong 7.7 earthquake, centered in the Pazarcik district, jolted Kahramanmaras and strongly shook several provinces, including Gaziantep, Sanliurfa, Diyarbakir, Adana, Adiyaman, Malatya, Osmaniye, Hatay, and Kilis. Later, at 13.24 p.m. (1024GMT), a 7.6 magnitude quake centered in Kahramanmaras' Elbistan district struck the region. Turkiye declared 7 days of national mourning after deadly earthquakes in southern provinces. Sercan Kucuksahin / Anadolu Agency
